thread.title: In the Elevator With HQ Trivia’s Host

author: Joanna Stern
title: In the Elevator With HQ Trivia’s Host
text:
“Quiz Daddy” Scott Rogowsky talks about what has made the twice-daily online quiz show HQ Trivia such a hit.
In a throwback to the days when popular network shows bound viewers to their televisions, HQ Trivia—an heir of game shows spanning “The Price Is Right” to the ’90s videogame “You Don’t Know Jack— has hooked hundreds of thousands of fans to click on the iPhone app at 3 p.m. and 9 p.m.
